UMCS.Games
Class BSRandomGame

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--UMCS.Games.Lib.AbstractGame
        |
        +--UMCS.Games.BSRandomGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game
public class BSRandomGame
extends AbstractGame
implements Game

Bounded Sum - RANDOM GAME Implements an incremental random game tree for OmSearch. Gives evaluations simultaneously for a set of opponents. The Branchingfactor is selected randomly per child between minwidth and maxwidth (inclusive). the two evaluation functions are bounded to each other. Parent node base[0] is used as random seed for children. Games played with the same start move will be identical, independent of the used search algorithm.

Version:
JUNE 2003
Author:
Jeroen Donkers
